text.__SUMMARY__:
Fritillaria taipaiensis is a Chinese plant species of the lily family. It is found only in China, found in the Provinces of Gansu, Hubei, Shaanxi, and Sichuan.Fritillaria taipaiensis produces bulbs up to 20 mm in diameter. Stem is up to 100 cm tall. Flowers are nodding (hanging downwards), yellow-green with deep purple markings.
formerly includedFritillaria taipaiensis var. ningxiaensis Y.K.Yang & J.K.Wu - now called Fritillaria yuzhongensis G.D.Yu & Y.S.Zhou
Fritillaria taipaiensis var. yuxiensis Y.K.Yang, Z.Y.Gao & C.S.Zhou - now called Fritillaria yuzhongensis G.D.Yu & Y.S.Zhou
Fritillaria taipaiensis var. zhouquensis S.C.Chen & G.D.Yu - now called Fritillaria sichuanica S.C.Chen
